mapper.select: SELECT a.account_no ,username ,name ,gender ,age ,address ,hobby ,enroll_date ,image ,height ,weight ,game_image ,nickname ,mmr ,SKELETAL_MUSCLE ,BODY_FAT_MASS ,BODY_FAT_PERCENTAGE ,ABDOMINAL_FAT_RATE ,BASAL_METABOLIC_RATE FROM account a ,game_account g , inbody i WHERE a.account_no = i.account_no and a.account_no = g.account_no and username = #{username}
select gameroom_no ,account_no ,game_date ,gameroom_rank from gameroom_ranking WHERE account_no = #{accountNo} ORDER BY game_date

SELECT CATEGORY ,AVG(accuracy) accuracy ,end_postdate FROM workout w,calendar c WHERE w.calendar_no=c.calendar_no and accuracy is not null and c.account_no = #{accountNo} GROUP BY CATEGORY,end_postdate ORDER BY TRUNC(end_postdate)
